attributes.action: Ensure the Mayday Hospital in Croydon keeps it's A & E unit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A new report by the BMA has shown that NHS London considers there to only be the need for three out of Kingston Hospital, the Mayday in Croydon, Epsom and St Helier Hospitals and St George’s in Tooting to have an A & E or maternity unit. 

Should these areas really have to fight to keep these departments? Can NHS London provide the level of care people in South London need without any one of these units? We say NO!!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to ensure the Mayday Hospital in Croydon keeps it's A & E unit.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=SaveMaydaysAandE


Her Majesty's Government
